Title: (Don't) Say Anything
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Jim Danger Gray, Jordan Harrison (story editor)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: A new job puts Taystee close to Caputo. Lorna has to get creative in her marriage. Soso and Poussey deal with some awkward truths.
